page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: Most of the inhabitants of our D block live in Cimla.It is a suburb of Neath.Most houses are modern,some are over 100 years old.Our block contains a comprehensive school,junior school and an infant school with a nursery unit and 2 play groups.There are 5 general shops,2 post offices,a warehouse,hairdresser and a "fish and chip" shop.There is a modern church(St Peter and St Paul), a fire station and a hospital.Cimla has neither a health centre nor a dentist but there is to be a community centre.Public transport is good and regular.There are 2 public houses and 2 clubhouses in the block.Farming and forestry are important in the area.Amenities include parkland with areas for leisure activities,sports grounds and community groups,e.g. cub-scouts hall.It is an expanding community.
